data.name: Newton and the Apple Tree - 18+ Patch
data.detailed_description:
This DLC uncensors all dialogue and scenes. In addition it adds a gallery to view CGs and movies at any time.
In downloading this DLC you are confirming you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and agree to seeing content of a sexual nature.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC uncensors all dialogue and scenes. In addition it adds a gallery to view CGs and movies at any time.

data.short_description: Newton and the Apple Tree at its steamiest!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
